channel.title: Jqgrid on Adam.Blog()
channel.description: Recent content in Jqgrid on Adam.Blog()

item.title: Example of jqGrid with ColdFusion
item.description: Earlier last month I blogged about how to use jqGrid, a grid component written on top of jQuery, with ColdFusion. A reader of the site asked that I put up an actual demo of this in action. As a result I have setup a demo page with a basic jqGrid implementation that displays names and email addresses, and supports paging and sorting. So without further ado here is the link to the demo page. For more demos and examples you can also visit my Blog Code Home. Happy coding!
